rules_text:
Target player sacrifices any number of lands. That player searches their library for up to that many land cards, puts them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.
Fabled {5}{G}{G} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that player.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant player
Enchanted player may play an additional land on each of their turns.
Enchanted player may play lands from their graveyard.
